title.remarksConfirmationTitle: This will reject entire order. Are you sure ?
title.grnDeliveryDateEdit: Allow user to edit delivery date on good receiving
title.cancelPO: Cancel Purchase Order in same day
title.skipPrApproval: Item does not go through approval
title.supplierUnableToMeetDemands: Receive notifications when supplier deviate from PR
title.ocrGrnEdit: Ability to amend good receipt note in OCR Staff Interface
title.grnEditable: Ability to amend Good Receipt Note
title.whatsappPO: Ability to send Purchase Orders via Whatsapp to Adhoc Suppliers
title.stockTransfer: Ability to record transfer of stock within an oraganization
title.auditLogAdminOnly: Ability to view the audit logs within an organization
title.ocrPOQtyPrice: Ability to view PO Quantity and Price in OCR Staff Interface
title.editPrItemPrice: Ability to amend the price before supplier processes order
title.massInvoiceGeneration: Ability to generate more than one e-invoice at a time
title.mandatoryHardCopyInvoiceNumber: Ability to input hardcopy invoice number beforegenerating e-invoice
title.massProcessOrder: Ability to process more than one order at a time
title.editPendingInvoice: Ability to amend invoices before generating them
title.itemDeviation: Ability to add items to purchase request
title.manageAdhoc: Access to manage Adhoc item promotions and updates
